question: How do I apply for admission and what documents are needed?
answer:
For B.Tech – Apply through TS EAMCET counselling (70% seats) or Management/NRI quota (30%).
For M.Tech – Admission via GATE/PGECET or sponsored category.
For MBA – Through ICET or equivalent test.
10th & 12th marksheets, TC, EAMCET/ECET/PGECET rank card, caste/income certificate (if applicable), ID proof, passport-size photos.
combined_text:
How do I apply for admission and what documents are needed? | ANSWER: For B.Tech – Apply through TS EAMCET counselling (70% seats) or Management/NRI quota (30%).
For M.Tech – Admission via GATE/PGECET or sponsored category.
For MBA – Through ICET or equivalent test.
10th & 12th marksheets, TC, EAMCET/ECET/PGECET rank card, caste/income certificate (if applicable), ID proof, passport-size photos.
